title: Luke Adams joins Tech basketball staff - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Luke Adams joins Tech basketball staff - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Luke Adams has been named Texas Tech men's basketball Director of Player Development after a successful run as the head coach at New Mexico Junior College the past four seasons. Adams, who played guard for the Red Raiders from 2012-15 and was an Academic All-Big 12 First Team selection, joins the Red Raider program led by his father, head coach Mark Adams.
